# Host Docs

## Host

- [Clients](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/host/client.md): Learn how to write .NET Orleans clients.
- [Silo lifecycle](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/host/silo-lifecycle.md): Learn about .NET Orleans silo lifecycles.
- [Heterogeneous silos](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/host/heterogeneous-silos.md): Learn an overview of heterogeneous silos in .NET Orleans.
- [Grain directory](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/host/grain-directory.md): Learn about the grain directory in .NET Orleans.
- [PowerShell client module](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/host/powershell-client.md): Learn about the PowerShell client module in .NET Orleans.

- [Configuration Guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/orleans/host/configuration-guide/llms.txt)
